mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense (warehouse_name, expense_date, category, amount, description) VALUES (#{warehouseName}, #{expenseDate}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM expense WHERE expense_id = #{id} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: UPDATE expense SET warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}, expense_date = #{expenseDate}, category = #{category}, amount = #{amount}, description = #{description}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE expense_id = #{id} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.select: SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS totalAmount FROM expense WHERE YEAR(expense_date) = #{year} AND status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY category
SELECT MONTH(expense_date) AS month, SUM(amount) AS totalExpenses FROM expense WHERE YEAR(expense_date) = #{year} AND status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY MONTH(expense_date)
